Uses of Class
network.Edge

  • Packages that use Edge 
    Package Description
    choiceModel  
    network  

    • Uses of Edge in choiceModel

      Methods in choiceModel with parameters of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private double RUM.calculateStandardGenCost(Edge edge)
      Standard linear route choice specification.
      double RUM.genCost(Edge edge)
      maybe somewhat of a misnomer, "generalized cost" in this context means the linear and additive deterministic part of route cost, using generalized cost parameters, but not taking into account the theta value of the RUM.

    • Uses of Edge in network

      Fields in network declared as Edge 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Edge[] Network.edges
      Set of edges, implemented as an array.
      Fields in network with type parameters of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<Edge> Path.edges
      Path as an ordered set of edges, e.g.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Edge>> Network.edgesNodePair
      Edges identified by their tail and head, which is not only preferable to having a dedicated set of edge indices, but also more computationally efficient when recalling an edge from node i to j, and more convenient.
      Methods in network that return Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge Network.getEdge(int edgeID)
      Gets an edge by its single integer ID; this method should be phased out in favour of strictly adhering to the structure of Network.edgesNodePair, where edges are identified by head- and tail nodes.
      Edge Network.getEdge(int tail, int head)
      This is the preferred way of recalling edges, replacing getEdge(int).
      Edge Network.getEdge(Node tail, Node head)
      This another acceptable way of recalling edges, replacing getEdge(int); slightly faster is the mapping by integer ID, see Network.getEdge(int, int).
      Methods in network that return types with arguments of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Edge> Network.nodeSeqAsEdgeList(int[] nodeSeq)
      Takes in a sequence of integers corresponding to nodes and returns a list of edges corresponding to the pairs of nodes that occur in the series: in: node1|node2|node3 out: edge12 | edge23
      Constructor parameters in network with type arguments of type Edge 
      Constructor and Description
      Path(java.util.ArrayList<Edge> edges, OD od)
      Constructs a path from a set of edges, with an explicitly specified OD relation to facilitate certain method calls.
